# ICanopeeConfigurationReader.Initialize method

Initialize the reader, using configuration.

```csharp
public void Initialize(IConfiguration serviceConfiguration, IConfiguration loggingConfiguration)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| serviceConfiguration | the configuration service configuration |
| loggingConfiguration | the logger configuration, needed to initialize the logger of the class |
